Diatsigkos Dimitrios

Profile

Diatsigkos Dimitris is a Chemist in Secondary Education. Since 2010 he is a Special Education Teacher. His students have learning disabilities ranging from autism and attention deficit disorder, to visual impairments and emotional disturbances

Education

  • Department of Chemistry University of Thessaloniki
  • Master degree in Education University of Patra
  • Department of Informatics of the Ionian University
